They like its color, with one mentioning it's true to size, and consider it a great value for the price. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black fitted dress
items.body: Love the dress. Fits great and looks super cute. Bought it for a possible mascarade party. I'm 5'6 for reference Read more
items.author: Heather Dobkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ Confidence in Dress Form
items.body: I donâ€™t usually write reviews, but this dress deserves its moment. If youâ€™re looking for something that makes you feel classy and a little dangerous, this is it. The material is soft, stretchy, and flattering in all the right places without feeling tight or uncomfortable. The slit? Chefâ€™s kiss. Itâ€™s bold but tasteful! The perfect amount of leg without crossing into too much.This neckline gives it a modern, elegant twist that sets it apart from all the other black dresses out there. Iâ€™ve worn plenty of dresses that claim to â€œhug your curves,â€ but this one actually does it in a way that makes you feel snatched, confident, and totally yourself. I felt sexy, strong, and like I owned the room. Looking for any and every opportunity to wear this dress again If youâ€™re on the fence, just get it. This little black dress is truly that girl. Read more
items.author: JJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make you look stunning ðŸŒŸ
items.body: Dress was shaped really nice arond the neck. The slit was good but the top of the dress is where the appeals are, and how it slightly flows away from the body. Beautiful color and texture. High quality deeling fabric. Great dress just not for my boy! Read more
items.author: Megan Hutchens

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price!
items.body: I loved the fit and quality for the price. I wore it to a wedding and received tons of compliments. The burgundy/wine color was vibrant and perfect for a fall wedding. The slit was classy and not too revealing for church. The material isn't thin or thick, just right. Only negative thing for me was that at 5'2, it was a tiny bit long even with 4in heels. But I made it work without getting it hemmed. This is the second dress I have from this brand and haven't been disappointed! Will definitely order again. Read more
items.author: Marigold N

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and fit well!
items.body: Cute, fit well, nice comfy material! Read more
items.author: Mrs. Lewis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Guest wedding dress.
items.body: Flattering dress for cocktail party or wedding quest. Felt comfortable and sexy in this dress. Read more
items.author: Carolyn Hanold

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but the color was off a lot
items.body: Ok the overall quality of this dress was great! great material with good stretch. It was true to size and a great length. The price was ok. My biggest complaint is that the dress was a much much brighter blue than on the picture so we ended up having to send it back. Read more
items.author: Jamie Long

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Dress Great Value
items.body: This is the very first dress that I have purchased online. I was a bit unsure about doing so, I ended up ordering two dresses. I am an in between size on the size chart. I went with a L. I am 5â€™4â€ tall, the I was swimming in the top. I returned the first dress hassle free. The second dress was a M Petite. I immediately fell in love with this dress! It was easy to put on and take off. I really like the zipper on the side. It felt great on. The material inside the dress felt soft on my skin. The material was thick enough so you could not see through. The slit was the perfect length. It was very easy to walk in including walking up steps. It was ready to wear right out of the bag. I put the dress in a duffle bag to transport it to a wedding. It did not have to be ironed when it took it out of my bad. The dress held shape, color and fit when washed and dryed. I did not need onion the dress as I took it straight out of the dryer and f hung it up. It is ready to go for the next event. I like the quality of the dress I felt wonderful in this dress with this color! The lroce of the dress was great too. I would buy from this company again. This was a hassle free experience even with the one return. Read more
items.author: Well Lets See

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Cocktail Evening Split Bodycon Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Cocktail Evening Split Bodycon Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Teal Color, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
